name: GALLIUM Artefacts
description: Detects artefacts associated with activity group GALLIUM - Microsoft Threat Intelligence Center indicators released in December 2019.
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.hash.sha1:e570585edc69f9074cb5e8a790708336bd45ca0f AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\:\\Program\ Files\(x86\)\\* OR *\:\\Program\ Files\\*))))`
